summary: This bill, the Protecting Gold Star Spouses Act of 2025, proposes interim appropriations for the Coast Guard Retired Serviceman's Family Protection and Survivor Benefits Plans for each fiscal year after 2024. It specifies that funds will be appropriated as needed, following the terms and conditions outlined in the Consolidated Appropriations Act of 2021. It also addresses how these expenditures will be handled if subsequent appropriations are enacted.
